description: The Mountain Creek Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Mountain Creek for the snow report
Alexa, ask Mountain Creek for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Mountain Creek
shortDescription: The Mountain Creek Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Mountain Creek.
